neurocaps.analysis.standardize

neurocaps.analysis.standardize(subject_timeseries: Dict[str, Dict[str, ndarray]] | str) → Dict[str, ndarray][source]

Standardize Subject Timeseries

Standardizes each run independently for all subjects in the subject timeseries.

Parameters:

subject_timeseries_list (List[Dict]] or List[str]) –

A list of pickle files containing the nested subject timeseries dictionary saved by the TimeSeriesExtractor class or a list of nested subject timeseries dictionaries produced by the TimeSeriesExtractor class. The first level of the nested dictionary must consist of the subject ID as a string, the second level must consist of the run numbers in the form of ‘run-#’ (where # is the corresponding number of the run), and the last level must consist of the timeseries (as a numpy array) associated with that run. The structure is as follows:

subject_timeseries = {
        "101": {
            "run-0": np.array([timeseries]), # 2D array
            "run-1": np.array([timeseries]), # 2D array
            "run-2": np.array([timeseries]), # 2D array
        },
        "102": {
            "run-0": np.array([timeseries]), # 2D array
            "run-1": np.array([timeseries]), # 2D array
        }
    }

Returns:

Dict[str, Dict[str, np.ndarray]]
